8410337311038.name: Castaño Rosado Golosa Frescura
8410337311038.about_winery: Bodegas Castaño is a family-run winery with a passion for Monastrell, combining tradition and modernity to create vibrant, character-driven wine.
8410337311038.description: This expressive rosé delights with its juicy freshness and vibrant character. Bursting with notes of ripe red berries, hints of watermelon, and a whisper of floral undertones, it offers a smooth, well-rounded texture. With a crisp, lingering finish, it’s ideal for those who seek charm, fruitiness, and elegance in every sip.
8410337311038.flavours: Juicy red berries such as strawberry and cherry, with floral hints and a rounded, refreshing finish.

8410337311045.name: Granza Organic Rosé Wine
8410337311045.about_winery: Granza focuses on organic wines that reflect purity and sustainability in winemaking.
8410337311045.description: Organically produced, this Cigales rosé merges respect for nature with a vibrant fruit expression. Notes of red berries and wildflowers shine through, offering a naturally fresh and harmonious finish.
8410337311045.flavours: Fresh red berries and subtle herbal notes, with natural vibrancy.

8410337311052.name: Alma Atlántica Rosé
8410337311052.about_winery: Alma Atlántica celebrates modern Galician wines with a youthful, vibrant twist.
8410337311052.description: Inspired by the Atlantic breeze, this rosé offers a light and refreshing experience. Its aromatic profile includes fresh red fruits, citrus, and a subtle saline touch reminiscent of the sea. Ideal for those seeking a wine with a fresh, modern character.
8410337311052.flavours: Red berries with citrus zest and a faint saline touch.

8410337311069.name: Cune Rosado
8410337311069.about_winery: Cune (CVNE) blends tradition and innovation, producing wines since 1879.
8410337311069.description: This fresh and fruity rosé captivates with aromas of strawberry, cherry, and a touch of peach. Medium-bodied with a silky texture, it strikes the perfect balance between acidity and sweetness, ending on a smooth and inviting note.
8410337311069.flavours: Raspberry, cherry, and a touch of peach with a smooth finish.

8410337311076.name: Viña Pomal Rosado
8410337311076.about_winery: Viña Pomal represents the classic Rioja spirit with over a century of expertise.
8410337311076.description: Bright in color and intense in aroma, this Garnacha-based rosé unfolds with notes of strawberry, raspberry, and rose petals. On the palate, it’s smooth and balanced, with a long, fresh finish—perfect for relaxing moments.
8410337311076.flavours: Notes of red fruits, rose petals, and a crisp mineral edge.

8410337311083.name: Protos Clarete Rosé Wine
8410337311083.about_winery: Protos combines tradition and excellence, rooted in Spain’s prestigious Ribera del Duero.
8410337311083.grape: Blend of red and white grapes
8410337311083.description: A characterful clarete that combines the structure of a red wine with the lightness of a rosé. Ripe red fruit aromas, herbal nuances, and a round texture lead to a persistent and refreshing finish. A perfect choice for those who enjoy intensity with freshness.
8410337311083.flavours: Juicy red fruits, subtle herbaceous notes, and good volume.

8410337311090.name: Torres Viña Esmeralda Rosé
8410337311090.about_winery: Torres is a globally respected family winery, known for its innovation and environmental commitment.
8410337311090.description: This charming rosé captivates with its delicate hue and floral, fruity bouquet. Flavors of ripe strawberry, watermelon, and a hint of orange blossom create a silky, refreshing sensation that delights in every sip.
8410337311090.flavours: Strawberry, rosewater, and hints of watermelon.

8410337311106.name: Montecillo Rosé
8410337311106.about_winery: Montecillo is one of Rioja’s oldest wineries, committed to heritage and high-quality winemaking.
8410337311106.description: With a pale pink hue and elegant character, this Rioja rosé stands out for its smoothness and finesse. Notes of red berries like cherry and currant blend with a subtle citrus touch. The finish is clean and refreshing—ideal for those who appreciate sophistication in every glass.
8410337311106.flavours: Fresh notes of cherry, wild strawberry, and a subtle citrus lift.

8410337311113.name: Fidencio Rosado
8410337311113.about_winery: Produced by Bodegas Finca La Blanca, a family-run estate with a tradition of crafting approachable wines that highlight the purity of their native region.
8410337311113.description: This elegant rosé from La Mancha dazzles with its vibrant pink hue and youthful charm. Bursting with aromas of red berries, strawberry, and a hint of floral sweetness, it offers a smooth, refreshing texture. Balanced and lively, it delivers a crisp finish that makes it the perfect choice for warm days or light-hearted gatherings.
8410337311113.flavours: Notes of strawberry, raspberry, and a gentle floral undertone, with a clean, smooth texture and a refreshing finish.

8410337311120.name: Veliterra Rueda Verdejo
8410337311120.about_winery: Veliterra focuses on expressive varietals from traditional Spanish regions, offering freshness and authenticity in every bottle.
8410337311120.description: This crisp Verdejo from Rueda offers a bright and zesty profile, with notes of green apple, citrus, and a touch of fennel. Fresh and vibrant, it delivers a lively, clean finish—ideal for those who enjoy clarity and freshness in every glass.
8410337311120.flavours: Green apple, citrus zest, and subtle fennel with a crisp and dry finish.

8410337311137.name: CUATRO RAYAS Cantarranas Verdejo
8410337311137.about_winery: Cuatro Rayas is a cooperative with deep roots in Rueda, producing consistent and expressive Verdejos.
8410337311137.description: Aromatic and refreshing, this Verdejo delights with hints of tropical fruit, citrus peel, and fresh herbs. Its smooth texture and balanced acidity make it a perfect companion for light dishes and relaxed moments.
8410337311137.flavours: Tropical fruits, citrus, and floral notes with refreshing acidity.

8410337311144.name: Ramón Bilbao Verdejo
8410337311144.about_winery: Ramón Bilbao combines innovation and tradition to produce expressive wines with personality.
8410337311144.description: Elegant and expressive, this Rueda Verdejo features aromas of white peach, lemon zest, and subtle floral notes. On the palate, it is fresh and silky, with a refined finish that lingers gently—perfect for lovers of finesse and brightness.
8410337311144.flavours: White peach, lime, and floral aromas with a smooth and zesty finish.

8410337311151.name: CUATRO RAYAS Verdejo Vendimia Nocturna
8410337311151.about_winery: Cuatro Rayas specializes in Verdejo, with modern techniques and a sustainable focus.
8410337311151.description: Harvested under the cool night sky, this wine preserves its vibrant aromas of lime, pear, and fresh-cut grass. Its crisp acidity and clean finish make it a refreshing and lively choice for warm evenings or seafood pairings.
8410337311151.flavours: Notes of pear, citrus, and green herbs with vibrant acidity.

8410337311168.name: Hoya de Cadenas Chardonnay Sauvignon Blanc
8410337311168.about_winery: Hoya de Cadenas is known for combining Mediterranean terroir with innovative techniques.
8410337311168.description: A delightful blend of Chardonnay and Sauvignon Blanc, this white wine opens with tropical fruits, citrus, and a hint of white flowers. Balanced and smooth, it offers a refreshing finish with a touch of creaminess that enhances its complexity.
8410337311168.flavours: Pineapple, lemon, and white flower aromas with a crisp, clean finish.

8410337311175.name: Celeste Verdejo
8410337311175.about_winery: Part of the Torres family, Celeste wines are inspired by the night sky and mountain vineyards.
8410337311175.description: Inspired by the stars of the Ribera del Duero sky, this Verdejo bursts with aromas of grapefruit, passion fruit, and herbal nuances. Its vibrant palate and lingering freshness make it an elegant expression of modern white winemaking.
8410337311175.flavours: Grapefruit, passion fruit, and floral hints with crisp minerality.

8410337311182.name: CUATRO RAYAS Pampano Organic Afrutado Verdejo
8410337311182.about_winery: Cuatro Rayas embraces sustainability, producing wines that are pure and eco-friendly.
8410337311182.description: This organic, fruit-forward Verdejo showcases juicy pear, melon, and hints of floral honey. Soft on the palate with gentle sweetness, it’s a charming and approachable wine for those who enjoy aromatic whites with a smooth finish.
8410337311182.flavours: Juicy pear, melon, and floral honey with a light sweetness.

8410337311199.name: Señorío de los Llanos Verdejo
8410337311199.about_winery: Señorío de los Llanos produces value-driven wines with regional identity.
8410337311199.description: Light and refreshing, this Verdejo offers clean aromas of green apple, citrus, and a subtle herbaceous touch. With a smooth, easy-drinking character, it’s a versatile wine ideal for casual sipping or light appetizers.
8410337311199.flavours: Green apple, lemon peel, and light herbal tones.

8410337311205.name: Finca del Mar Verdejo
8410337311205.about_winery: Finca del Mar blends sea breeze and sun in expressive, easy-drinking wines.
8410337311205.description: Evoking coastal freshness, this Verdejo features bright citrus, white peach, and floral hints. Its lively acidity and crisp finish provide a refreshing experience that pairs beautifully with seafood or Mediterranean cuisine.
8410337311205.flavours: Citrus, stone fruit, and light floral notes with a smooth, balanced finish.

8410337311212.name: Viña Cumbrero Crianza
8410337311212.about_winery: Traditional Rioja producer focused on authentic barrel-aged reds.
8410337311212.description: This refined Crianza from Rioja reveals a harmonious balance of ripe red fruits, vanilla, and subtle spice from oak aging. Smooth and full-bodied, it offers a lingering finish with hints of toast and sweet spice—perfect for those who value elegance and tradition.
8410337311212.flavours: Ripe red fruits, vanilla, and spice with a smooth, oaky finish.

8410337311229.name: Montesierra Young Red Wine
8410337311229.about_winery: Focuses on expressive, fruit-forward young wines.
8410337311229.description: Fresh and fruity, this young red displays vibrant notes of cherry, raspberry, and a touch of licorice. Light and easy-drinking, it’s an ideal choice for casual moments, delivering pure varietal expression with a smooth finish.

8410337311236.name: Hoya de Cadenas Cabernet Sauvignon Crianza
8410337311236.about_winery: Combines modern techniques and Mediterranean tradition.
8410337311236.description: Crafted with precision, this Cabernet Sauvignon offers bold flavors of blackberry, black pepper, and oak. Aged in barrel for added complexity, it delivers a rich, structured mouthfeel and a long, satisfying finish—ideal for lovers of intense, elegant reds.

8410337311243.name: Pata Negra Crianza
8410337311243.description: A classic Ribera del Duero, this Crianza reveals deep aromas of black fruit, toast, and a touch of clove. Balanced and velvety, its well-integrated tannins and persistent finish make it an excellent companion to hearty dishes and fine dining.

8410337311250.name: Laudum Monastrell Roble
8410337311250.about_winery: Bodegas Bocopa blends innovation and tradition.
8410337311250.description: This expressive Monastrell, aged briefly in oak, offers rich aromas of plum, spice, and toasted wood. Full-bodied yet smooth, it delivers depth and warmth with a touch of Mediterranean soul in every sip.

8410337311267.name: Bodegas Aragonesas Solo Syrah Tirio
8410337311267.description: Made from 100% Syrah, this bold red wine opens with dark fruit aromas, violet, and black pepper. Silky and intense, it showcases the varietal’s character with elegance and power—perfect for those who enjoy expressive, modern reds.

8410337311274.name: Finca del Mar Cabernet Sauvignon Crianza
8410337311274.about_winery: Inspired by the Mediterranean sea and sun.
8410337311274.description: This Crianza-style Cabernet seduces with blackcurrant, roasted coffee, and spice notes. Its oak aging brings structure and a smooth finish, offering a bold yet polished experience for refined palates.

8410337311281.name: Señorío de los Llanos Reserva
8410337311281.description: Aged to perfection, this Reserva wine reveals complex layers of dried fruit, leather, and vanilla. Elegant and mature, its smooth tannins and long finish make it a timeless choice for classic wine lovers.

8410337311298.name: Silanus Young Red
8410337311298.description: Youthful and vibrant, this red wine presents fresh aromas of berries, cherry, and soft floral touches. Light-bodied with a juicy character, it’s ideal for casual enjoyment with a clean, approachable finish.
8410337311298.flavours: Red berries, floral notes, juicy body.
